languages.text: "Мы можем помочь друг другу, элантах. Ты станешь моими крыльями, я — твоим разящим копьем. И гласом разума при встречах с моими собратьями. Если этого мало..." {n}Ирлиэт задумывается на мгновение и осторожно продолжает.{/n} "Я обещаю тебе славную награду, элантах. Сокровища моего мира, сокрытые в пустоте космоса, в обмен на спасение моих собратьев. Все это в том случае, если сей договор не будет нарушен".

"We can help one another, elantach. You will be my wings, and I your wounding spear. And your voice of reason, should you encounter my kin. If that is still not enough..." {n}Yrliet thinks for a moment and continues carefully.{/n} "I promise you a wondrous reward, elantach. The treasures of my world hidden in the vastness of space in exchange for the rescue of my kin. If you remain true to your word and do not go back on our covenant."
languages.original_text: "Мы можем помочь друг другу, элантах. Ты станешь моими крыльями, я — твоим разящим копьем. И гласом разума при встречах с моими собратьями. Если этого мало..." {n}Ирлиэт задумывается на мгновение и осторожно продолжает.{/n} "Я обещаю тебе славную награду, элантах. Сокровища моего мира, сокрытые в пустоте космоса, в обмен на спасение моих собратьев. Все это в том случае, если сей договор не будет нарушен".

If this is not still not enough..." {n}Yrliet thinks for a moment and continues carefully.{/n} "I promise you a wondrous reward, elantach. The treasures of my world hidden in the vastness of space in exchange for the rescue of my kin. In case you remain true to your word and do not go back on our covenant."

languages.text: 「エランタよ、我らは互いに助け合える。お前は我の翼となり、我がお前の槍となろう。そして、もし我の一族と遭遇したのならば、我がお前の理性の声となろう。それでも足りないと言うのであれば…」{n}ユリエットは考え込み、慎重に続けた。{/n}「素晴らしい報酬を約束しよう、エランタ。我の一族を救出する代わりに、広大な宇宙に隠された我の星の宝物を提供しよう。お前が約束を守り、我らの契約を破らない限り」
languages.original_text: "We can help one another, elantach. You will be my wings, and I your wounding spear. And your voice of reason, should you encounter my kin. If that is still not enough..." {n}Yrliet thinks for a moment and continues carefully.{/n} "I promise you a wondrous reward, elantach. The treasures of my world hidden in the vastness of space in exchange for the rescue of my kin. If you remain true to your word and do not go back on our covenant."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタよ、我らは互いに助け合える。お前は我の翼となり、我がお前の槍となろう。そして、もし我の一族と遭遇したのならば、我がお前の理性の声となろう。それでも足りないと言うのであれば…」{n}ユリエットは考え込み、慎重に続けた。{/n}「素晴らしい報酬を約束しよう、エランタ。我の一族を救出する代わりに、広大な宇宙に隠された我の星の宝物を提供しよう。お前が約束を守り、我らの契約を破らない限り」

languages.text: « Nous pouvons nous entraider, elantach. Vous serez mes ailes, je serai votre lance. Et la voix de la raison, si vous deviez rencontrer d'autres de mes semblables. Et si cela ne suffit toujours pas... {n}Yrliet réfléchit un instant et reprend en pesant soigneusement chacun de ses mots.{/n} Je vous promets une incroyable récompense, elantach. Sauvez mes semblables et je vous offrirai les trésors de mon peuple, actuellement dissimulés au cœur de l'immensité de l'espace. Mais pour cela, il vous faudra tenir parole. »
languages.original_text: "We can help one another, elantach. You will be my wings, and I your wounding spear. And your voice of reason, should you encounter my kin. If that is still not enough..." {n}Yrliet thinks for a moment and continues carefully.{/n} "I promise you a wondrous reward, elantach. The treasures of my world hidden in the vastness of space in exchange for the rescue of my kin. If you remain true to your word and do not go back on our covenant."

traits.locale_text: « Nous pouvons nous entraider, elantach. Vous serez mes ailes, je serai votre lance. Et la voix de la raison, si vous deviez rencontrer d'autres de mes semblables. Et si cela ne suffit toujours pas... {n}Yrliet réfléchit un instant et reprend en pesant soigneusement chacun de ses mots.{/n} Je vous promets une incroyable récompense, elantach. Sauvez mes semblables et je vous offrirai les trésors de mon peuple, actuellement dissimulés au cœur de l'immensité de l'espace. Mais pour cela, il vous faudra tenir parole. »

languages.text: “我们可以互相帮助，外界人。你会成为我的翅膀，我也会成为你的利矛。如果你遇到了我的族人，我还可以成为你的理性之声。如果这还不够的话……”{n}伊莉耶特思考片刻，小心翼翼地继续开了口。{/n}“我向你保证，我会给你丰厚的报酬，外界人。我的世界无数宝藏藏在浩瀚的太空之中。只要你信守诺言，不要违背我们之间的约定，我就愿意用它们来交换我的族人。”
languages.original_text: "We can help one another, elantach. You will be my wings, and I your wounding spear. And your voice of reason, should you encounter my kin. If that is still not enough..." {n}Yrliet thinks for a moment and continues carefully.{/n} "I promise you a wondrous reward, elantach. The treasures of my world hidden in the vastness of space in exchange for the rescue of my kin. If you remain true to your word and do not go back on our covenant."

traits.locale_text: “我们可以互相帮助，外界人。你会成为我的翅膀，我也会成为你的利矛。如果你遇到了我的族人，我还可以成为你的理性之声。如果这还不够的话……”{n}伊莉耶特思考片刻，小心翼翼地继续开了口。{/n}“我向你保证，我会给你丰厚的报酬，外界人。我的世界无数宝藏藏在浩瀚的太空之中。只要你信守诺言，不要违背我们之间的约定，我就愿意用它们来交换我的族人。”

languages.text: «Podemos ayudarnos mutuamente, elantach. Usted será mis alas y yo su lanza llagadora. También su voz de la razón, si se llegara a topar con mi prole. Si con eso no le basta...». {n}Yrliet piensa un momento y continúa cuidadosamente.{/n} «Le prometo una recompensa maravillosa, elantach. Los tesoros de mi mundo que se hallan ocultos en la inmensidad del espacio a cambio del rescate de mi estirpe. Si mantiene su palabra y no se retracta de nuestro pacto».
languages.original_text: "We can help one another, elantach. You will be my wings, and I your wounding spear. And your voice of reason, should you encounter my kin. If that is still not enough..." {n}Yrliet thinks for a moment and continues carefully.{/n} "I promise you a wondrous reward, elantach. The treasures of my world hidden in the vastness of space in exchange for the rescue of my kin. If you remain true to your word and do not go back on our covenant."

traits.locale_text: «Podemos ayudarnos mutuamente, elantach. Usted será mis alas y yo su lanza llagadora. También su voz de la razón, si se llegara a topar con mi prole. Si con eso no le basta...». {n}Yrliet piensa un momento y continúa cuidadosamente.{/n} «Le prometo una recompensa maravillosa, elantach. Los tesoros de mi mundo que se hallan ocultos en la inmensidad del espacio a cambio del rescate de mi estirpe. Si mantiene su palabra y no se retracta de nuestro pacto».

languages.text: "Wir können einander helfen, Elantach. Ihr seid meine Flügel, ich Euer verwundender Speer. Und Eure Stimme der Vernunft, solltet Ihr meinem Volk begegnen. Wenn das noch immer nicht reicht ..." {n}Yrliet denkt kurz nach und fährt dann vorsichtig fort.{/n} "Ich verspreche Euch eine wundersame Belohnung, Elantach. Die Schätze meiner Welt, die in der Weite des Alls verborgen sind, im Tausch gegen die Rettung meines Volks. Wenn Ihr Wort haltet und unser Abkommen nicht brecht."
languages.original_text: "We can help one another, elantach. You will be my wings, and I your wounding spear. And your voice of reason, should you encounter my kin. If that is still not enough..." {n}Yrliet thinks for a moment and continues carefully.{/n} "I promise you a wondrous reward, elantach. The treasures of my world hidden in the vastness of space in exchange for the rescue of my kin. If you remain true to your word and do not go back on our covenant."

traits.locale_text: "Wir können einander helfen, Elantach. Ihr seid meine Flügel, ich Euer verwundender Speer. Und Eure Stimme der Vernunft, solltet Ihr meinem Volk begegnen. Wenn das noch immer nicht reicht ..." {n}Yrliet denkt kurz nach und fährt dann vorsichtig fort.{/n} "Ich verspreche Euch eine wundersame Belohnung, Elantach. Die Schätze meiner Welt, die in der Weite des Alls verborgen sind, im Tausch gegen die Rettung meines Volks. Wenn Ihr Wort haltet und unser Abkommen nicht brecht."

languages.text: "Birbirimize yardım edebiliriz elantach. Sen bana kanat ger, ben de düşmanlarına sapladığın mızrağın olayım. Soydaşlarımla karşılaştığında sağduyunun sesi de olabilirim. Bu da yetmezse..." {n}Yrliet bir an düşünüp sözlerini dikkatlice seçiyor.{/n} "Sana fevkalade bir ödül sözü veriyorum elantach. Soydaşlarımı kurtarman karşılığında, uzayın enginliğinde saklı dünyamın hazineleri senin olsun... Sözünü tuttuğun ve andımızı çiğnemediğin sürece."
languages.original_text: "We can help one another, elantach. You will be my wings, and I your wounding spear. And your voice of reason, should you encounter my kin. If that is still not enough..." {n}Yrliet thinks for a moment and continues carefully.{/n} "I promise you a wondrous reward, elantach. The treasures of my world hidden in the vastness of space in exchange for the rescue of my kin. If you remain true to your word and do not go back on our covenant."

Bu da yetmezse..." {n}Yrliet bir an düşünüp sözlerini dikkatlice seçiyor.{/n} "Sana fevkalade bir ödül sözü veriyorum elantach. Soydaşlarımı kurtarman karşılığında, uzayın enginliğinde saklı dünyamın hazineleri senin olsun... Sözünü tuttuğun ve andımızı çiğnemediğin sürece."
